'''Wizard hats''' are a form of head [[armour]]. Just like [[cap]]s, they provide no base [[AC]], but can be used by characters with [[antennae]], [[beak]]s, or all but the largest [[horns]] and can be [[scroll of enchant armour|enchanted]] to +2. Wizard hats can have the following [[ego]]s:
*[[Intelligence]] (+3)
*[[Magic resistance]] (+30)

The [[unique]] [[elephant slug]] [[Gastronok]] always carries a wizard hat which has a good chance of being enchanted or even [[Hat of Pondering|an artefact]].
